subject: Law
title: Mens Rea: The Guilty Mind
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Mens Rea: The Guilty Mind.

hook.text: Two people cause the same deathâ€”one on purpose, one by accident. The law treats them very differently.

buildup.text: Mens rea is the mental state required for a crime: did the defendant intend the harmful result?

discovery.text: The Model Penal Code defines four levels: purposely, knowingly, recklessly, and negligently.

twist.text: Some crimes are 'strict liability'â€”no mens rea needed. Selling alcohol to a minor counts regardless of intent.

climax.text: Mens rea separates murder from manslaughter, theft from honest mistake. Intent shapes the charge.

punchline.text: What you did matters. What you meant to do matters more.

quiz.question: What are the four Model Penal Code levels of mens rea?
